item.title: Ning!
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: I got accepted in the Ning developer's program! But I don't have a clue to what I'm going to do with it. Such a neat little playground, but I've already got too much to do! Please start sending me bundles of money so I can start clearing up larger blocks of free time.
